original: brahmaudanam pacati reta eva taddhatte yadājyamuciṣyate tena
analyzed: brahmaudanam pacati retaḥ eva tat dhatte yat ājyam uciṣyate tena

original: raśanāmabhyajyādatte tejo vā ājyam prājāpatyo'śvaḥ prajāpatimeva tejasā
analyzed: raśanām abhyajya ādatte tejaḥ vai ājyam prājāpatya ūśvaḥ prajāpatim eva tejasā

original: samardhayatyapūto vā eṣo'medhyo yadaśvaḥ 13.1.1.[2]
analyzed: samardhayati a pūtaḥ vai eṣaḥ umedhyaḥ yat aśvaḥ

original: darbhamayī raśanā bhavati pavitraṃ vai darbhāḥ punātyevainam pūtamevainam
analyzed: darbha mayī raśanā bhavati pavitram vai darbhāḥ punāti eva enam pūtam eva enam

original: medhyamālabhate 13.1.1.[3]
analyzed: medhyam ālabhate

original: aśvasya vā ālabdhasya reta udakrāmattatsuvarṇaṃ hiraṇyamabhavadyatsuvarṇaṃ
analyzed: aśvasya vai ālabdhasya retaḥ udakrāmat tat suvarṇam hiraṇyam abhavat yat suvarṇam

original: hiraṇyaṃ dadātyaśvameva retasā samardhayati 13.1.1.[4]
analyzed: hiraṇyam dadāti aśvam eva retasā samardhayati

original: prajāpatiryajñamasṛjata tasya mahimāpākrāmatsa mahartvijaḥ prāviśattam
analyzed: prajāpatiḥ yajñam asṛjata tasya mahimā apākrāmat sa mahartvijaḥ prāviśat tam

original: mahartvigbhiranvaicattam mahartvigbhiranvavindadyanmahartvijo brahmaudanam
analyzed: mahartvigbhiḥ anvaicat tam mahartvigbhiḥ anvavindat yat mahartvijaḥ brahmaudanam

original: prāśnanti mahimānameva tadyajñasya yajamāno'varunddhe brahmaudane suvarṇaṃ
analyzed: prāśnanti mahimānam eva tat yajñasya yajamānaḥ uvarunddhe brahmaudane suvarṇam

original: hiraṇyaṃ dadāti reto vā odano reto hiraṇyaṃ retasaivāsmiṃstadreto dadhāti śatamānam
analyzed: hiraṇyam dadāti retaḥ vai odanaḥ retaḥ hiraṇyam retasā eva asmin tat retaḥ dadhāti śata mānam

original: bhavati śatāyurvai puruṣaḥ śatendriya āyurevendriyaṃ vīryamātmandhatte
analyzed: bhavati śata āyuḥ vai puruṣaḥ śata indriyaḥ āyuḥ eva indriyam vīryam ātman dhatte

original: catuṣṭayīrapo vasatīvarīrmadhyamāyāhne gṛhṇāti tā digbhyaḥ samāhṛtā bhavanti
analyzed: catuṣṭayīḥ apaḥ vasatīvarīḥ madhyamāya ahne gṛhṇāti tāḥ digbhyaḥ samāhṛtāḥ bhavanti

original: dikṣu vā annamannamāpo'nnenaivāsmā annamavarunddhe 13.1.2.[1]
analyzed: dikṣu vai annam annam āponnena eva asmai annam avarunddhe

original: vyṛddhamu vā etadyajñasya yadayajuṣkeṇa kriyata
analyzed: vyṛddham u vai etat yajñasya yat ayajuṣkeṇa kriyata

original: imāmagṛbhṇanraśanāmṛtasyetyaśvābhidhānīmādatte yajuṣkṛtyai yajñasya samṛddhyai
analyzed: imām agṛbhṇan raśanām ṛtasya iti aśvābhidhānīm ādatte yajuṣkṛtyai yajñasya samṛddhyai

original: dvādaśāratnirbhavati dvādaśa māsāḥ saṃvatsaraḥ saṃvatsarameva yajñamāpnoti 13.1.2.[2]
analyzed: dvādaśa aratniḥ bhavati dvādaśa māsāḥ saṃvatsaraḥ saṃvatsaram eva yajñam āpnoti

original: tadāhuḥ dvādaśāratnī raśanā kāryā3 trayodaśāratnī3rityṛṣabho vā eṣa ṛtūnāṃ
analyzed: tat āhuḥ dvādaśa aratnī raśanā kāryā vai eṣaḥ ṛtūnām

original: yatsaṃvatsarastasya trayodaśo māso viṣṭapamṛṣabha eṣa yajñānāṃ yadaśvamedho
analyzed: yat saṃvatsaraḥ tasya trayodaśaḥ māsaḥ viṣṭapam ṛṣabhaḥ eṣa yajñānām yat aśvamedhaḥ

original: yathā vā ṛṣabhasya viṣṭapamevametasya viṣṭapaṃ trayodaśamaratniṃ
analyzed: yathā vai ṛṣabhasya viṣṭapam evam etasya viṣṭapam trayodaśa maratnim

original: raśanāyāmupādadhyāttadyatha ṛṣabhasya viṣṭapaṃ saṃstriyate tādṛktat 13.1.2.[3]
analyzed: raśanāyām upādadhyāt tat yathā ṛṣabhasya viṣṭapam saṃstriyate tādṛś tat

original: abhidhā asīti tasmādaśvamedhayājī sarvā diśo'bhijayati bhuvanamasīti bhuvanaṃ
analyzed: abhidhā asi iti tasmāt aśvamedha yājī sarvāḥ diśaḥ abhijayati bhuvanam asi iti bhuvanam

original: tajjayati yantāsi dharteti yantāramevainaṃ dhartāraṃ karoti sa tvamagniṃ
analyzed: tat jayati yantā asi dhartā iti yantāram eva enam dhartāram karoti sa tvam agnim

original: vaiśvānaramityagnimevainaṃ vaiśvānaraṃ gamayati saprathasaṃ gaceti
analyzed: vaiśvānaram iti agnim eva enam vaiśvānaram gamayati saprathasam gaca iti

original: prajayaivainam paśubhiḥ prathayati svāhākṛta iti vaṣaṭkāra evāsyaiṣa svagā tvā
analyzed: prajayā eva enam paśubhiḥ prathayati svāhākṛtaḥ iti vaṣaṭkāraḥ eva asya eṣa svagā tvā

original: devebhya iti devebhya evainaṃ svagā karoti prajāpataya iti prājāpatyo'śvaḥ
analyzed: devebhyaḥ iti devebhyaḥ eva enam svagā karoti prajāpataye iti prājāpatya ūśvaḥ

original: svayaivainaṃ devatayā samardhayati 13.1.2.[4]
analyzed: svayā eva enam devatayā samardhayati

original: īśvaro vā eṣaḥ ārtimārtoryo brahmaṇe devebhyo'pratiprocyāśvaṃ badhnāti
analyzed: īśvaraḥ vai eṣaḥ ārtim ārtoḥ yaḥ brahmaṇe devebhyaḥ pratiprocya aśvam badhnāti

original: brahmannaśvam bhantsyāmi devebhyaḥ prajāpataye tena rādhyāsamiti
analyzed: brahman aśvam bhantsyāmi devebhyaḥ prajāpataye tena rādhyāsam iti

original: brahmāṇamāmantrayate brahmaṇa evainam pratiprocya badhnāti nārtimārcati taṃ
analyzed: brahmāṇam āmantrayate brahmaṇe eva enam pratiprocya badhnāti na ārtim ārcati tam

original: badhāna devebhyaḥ prajāpataye tena rādhnuhīti brahmā prasauti svayaivainaṃ
analyzed: badhāna devebhyaḥ prajāpataye tena rādhnuhi iti brahmā prasauti svayā eva enam

original: devatayā samardhayatyatha prokṣatyasāveva bandhuḥ 13.1.2.[5]
analyzed: devatayā samardhayati atha prokṣati asau eva bandhuḥ

original: sa prokṣati prajāpataye tvā juṣṭam prokṣāmīti prajāpatirvai devānāṃ vīryavattamo
analyzed: sa prokṣati prajāpataye tvā juṣṭam prokṣāmi iti prajāpatiḥ vai devānām vīryavattamaḥ

original: vīryamevāsmindadhāti tasmādaśvaḥ paśūnāṃ vīryavattamaḥ 13.1.2.[6]
analyzed: vīryam eva asmin dadhāti tasmāt aśvaḥ paśūnām vīryavattamaḥ

original: indrāgnibhyāṃ tvā juṣṭam prokṣāmīti indrāgnī vai devānāmojasvitamā oja
analyzed: indra agnibhyām tvā juṣṭam prokṣāmi iti indra agnī vai devānām ojasvitamau ojaḥ

original: evāsmindadhāti tasmādaśvaḥ paśūnāmojasvitamaḥ 13.1.2.[7]
analyzed: eva asmin dadhāti tasmāt aśvaḥ paśūnām ojasvitamaḥ

original: vāyave tvā juṣṭam prokṣāmīti vāyurvai devānāmāśiṣṭho javamevāsmindadhāti
analyzed: vāyave tvā juṣṭam prokṣāmi iti vāyuḥ vai devānām āśiṣṭhaḥ javam eva asmin dadhāti

original: tasmādaśvaḥ paśūnāmāśiṣṭhaḥ 13.1.2.[8]
analyzed: tasmāt aśvaḥ paśūnām āśiṣṭhaḥ

original: viśvebhyastvā devebhyo juṣṭam prokṣāmīti viśve vai devā devānāṃ yaśasvitamā
analyzed: viśvebhyaḥ tvā devebhyaḥ juṣṭam prokṣāmi iti viśve vai devāḥ devānām yaśasvitamā

original: yaśa evāsmindadhāti tasmādaśvaḥ paśūnāṃ yaśasvitamaḥ sarvebhyastvā devebhyo
analyzed: yaśaḥ eva asmin dadhāti tasmāt aśvaḥ paśūnām yaśasvitamaḥ sarvebhyaḥ tvā devebhyaḥ

original: juṣṭam prokṣāmīti 13.1.2.[9]
analyzed: juṣṭam prokṣāmi iti

original: tadāhuḥ yatprājāpatyo'śvo'tha kathāpyanyābhyo devatābhyaḥ prokṣatīti sarvā vai
analyzed: tat āhuḥ yat prājāpatya uśvā utha kathā api anyābhyaḥ devatābhyaḥ prokṣati iti sarvāḥ vai

original: devatā aśvamedhe'nvāyattā yadāha sarvebhyastvā devebhyaḥ prokṣāmīti sarvā
analyzed: devatāḥ aśvamedhenu āyattāḥ yat āha sarvebhyaḥ tvā devebhyaḥ prokṣāmi iti sarvā

original: evāsmindevatā anvāyātayati tasmādaśvamedhe sarvā devatā anvāyattāḥ pāpmā vā etam
analyzed: eva asmin devatāḥ anvāyātayati tasmāt aśvamedhe sarvāḥ devatāḥ anvāyattāḥ pāpmā vai etam

original: bhrātṛvya īpsati yo'śvamedhena yajeta vajro'śvaḥ paro martaḥ paraḥ śveti śvānaṃ
analyzed: bhrātṛvyaḥ īpsati yaḥ uśvamedhena yajeta vajra uśvaḥ paraḥ martaḥ paraḥ śvā iti śvānam

original: caturakṣaṃ hatvādhaspadamaśvasyopaplāvayati vajreṇaivainamavakrāmati nainam
analyzed: catur akṣam hatvā adhaspadam aśvasya upaplāvayati vajreṇa eva enam avakrāmati na enam

original: pāpmā bhrātṛvya āpnoti 13.1.3.[1]
analyzed: pāpmā bhrātṛvyaḥ āpnoti

original: yathā vai haviṣo'hutasya skandet evametatpaśo skandati yaṃ
analyzed: yathā vai haviṣā hutasya skandet evam etat paśoḥ skandati yam

original: niktamanālabdhamutsṛjanti yatstokīyā juhoti sarvahutamevainaṃ
analyzed: niktam an ālabdham utsṛjanti yat stokīyāḥ juhoti sarva hutam eva enam

original: juhotyaskandāyāskannaṃ hi tadyaddhutasya skandati sahasraṃ juhoti sahasrasammito
analyzed: juhoti a skandāya a skannam hi tat yat hutasya skandati sahasram juhoti sahasra sammitaḥ

original: vai svargo lokaḥ svargasya lokasyābhijityai 13.1.3.[2]
analyzed: vai svargaḥ lokaḥ svargasya lokasya abhijityai

original: tadāhuḥ yanmitā juhuyātparimitamavarundhītetyamitā
analyzed: tat āhuḥ yat mitāḥ juhuyāt parimitam avarundhīta iti amitā

original: juhotyaparimitasyaivāvaruddhyā uvāca ha prajāpati stokīyāsu vā ahamaśvamedhaṃ
analyzed: juhoti aparimitasya eva avaruddhyai uvāca ha prajāpatiḥ stokīyāsu vai aham aśvamedham

original: saṃsthāpayāmi tena saṃsthitenaivāta ūrdhvaṃ carāmīti 13.1.3.[3]
analyzed: saṃsthāpayāmi tena saṃsthitena eva atas ūrdhvam carāmi iti

original: agnaye svāheti agnaya evainaṃ juhoti somāya svāheti somāyaivainaṃ juhotyapām
analyzed: agnaye svāhā iti agnaye eva enam juhoti somāya svāhā iti somāya eva enam juhoti apām

original: modāya svāhetyadbhya evainaṃ juhoti savitre svāheti savitra evainaṃ juhoti vāyave
analyzed: modāya svāhā iti adbhyaḥ eva enam juhoti savitre svāhā iti savitre eva enam juhoti vāyave

original: svāheti vāyava evainaṃ juhoti viṣṇave svāheti viṣṇava evainaṃ juhotīndrāya
analyzed: svāhā iti vāyave eva enam juhoti viṣṇave svāhā iti viṣṇave eva enam juhoti indrāya

original: svāhetīndrāyaivainaṃ juhoti bṛhaspataye svāheti bṛhaspataya evainaṃ juhoti mitrāya
analyzed: svāhā iti indrāya eva enam juhoti bṛhaspataye svāhā iti bṛhaspataye eva enam juhoti mitrāya

original: svāheti mitrāyaivainaṃ juhoti varuṇāya svāheti varuṇāyaivainaṃ juhotyetāvanto vai
analyzed: svāhā iti mitrāya eva enam juhoti varuṇāya svāhā iti varuṇāya eva enam juhoti etāvantaḥ vai

original: sarve devāstebhya evainaṃ juhoti parācīrjuhoti parāṅiva vai svargo lokaḥ svargasya
analyzed: sarve devāḥ tebhyaḥ eva enam juhoti parācīḥ juhoti parāṅ iva vai svargaḥ lokaḥ svargasya

original: lokasyābhijityai 13.1.3.[4]
analyzed: lokasya abhijityai

original: īśvaro vā eṣaḥ parāṅ pradaghoryaḥ parācīrāhutīrjuhoti punarāvartate'sminneva loke
analyzed: īśvaraḥ vai eṣaḥ parāṅ pradaghoḥ yaḥ parācīḥ āhutīḥ juhoti punar āvartate ismin eva loke

original: pratitiṣṭhatyetāṃ ha vāva sa yajñasya saṃsthitimuvācāskandāyāskannaṃ hi
analyzed: pratitiṣṭhati etām ha vāva sa yajñasya saṃsthitim uvāca a skandāya a skannam hi

original: tadyaddhutasya skandati 13.1.3.[5]
analyzed: tat yat hutasya skandati

original: yathā vai haviṣo'hutasya skandet evametatpaśo skandati yam
analyzed: yathā vai haviṣā hutasya skandet evam etat paśoḥ skandati yam

original: prokṣitamanālabdhamutsṛjanti yadrūpāṇi juhoti sarvahutamevainaṃ
analyzed: prokṣitam an ālabdham utsṛjanti yat rūpāṇi juhoti sarva hutam eva enam

original: juhotyaskandāyāskannaṃ hi tadyaddhutasya skandati hiṅkārāya svāhā hiṅkṛtāya
analyzed: juhoti a skandāya a skannam hi tat yat hutasya skandati hiṅkārāya svāhā hiṅkṛtāya

original: svāhetyetāni vā aśvasya rūpāṇi tānyevāvarunddhe 13.1.3.[6]
analyzed: svāhā iti etāni vai aśvasya rūpāṇi tāni eva avarunddhe

original: tadāhuḥ anāhutirvai rūpāṇi naitā hotavyā ityatho khalvāhuratra vā aśvamedhaḥ
analyzed: tat āhuḥ an āhutiḥ vai rūpāṇi na etāḥ hotavyāḥ iti atha u khalu āhuḥ atra vai aśvamedhaḥ

original: saṃtiṣṭhate yadrūpāṇi juhoti hotavyā eveti bahirdhā vā etamāyatanātkaroti
analyzed: saṃtiṣṭhate yat rūpāṇi juhoti hotavyāḥ eva iti bahirdhā vai etam āyatanāt karoti

original: bhrātṛvyamasmai janayati yasyānāyatane'nyatrāgnerāhutīrjuhoti 13.1.3.[7]
analyzed: bhrātṛvyam asmai janayati yasya an āyatanena atra agneḥ āhutīḥ juhoti

original: sāvitryā eveṣṭeḥ purastādanudrutya sakṛdeva rūpāṇyāhavanīye juhotyāyatana
analyzed: sāvitryāḥ eva iṣṭeḥ purastāt anudrutya sakṛt eva rūpāṇi āhavanīye juhoti āyatana

original: evāhutīrjuhoti nāsmai bhrātṛvyaṃ janayati yajñamukhe-yajñamukhe juhoti yajñasya
analyzed: eva āhutīḥ juhoti na asmai bhrātṛvyam janayati yajña mukhe yajña mukhe juhoti yajñasya

original: saṃtatyā avyavacedāya 13.1.3.[8]
analyzed: saṃtatyai a vyavacedāya

original: tadāhuḥ yadyajñamukhe-yajñamukhe juhuyātpaśubhirvyṛdhyeta
analyzed: tat āhuḥ yat yajña mukhe yajña mukhe juhuyāt paśubhiḥ vyṛdhyeta

original: pāpoyāntsyātsakṛdeva hotavyā na paśubhirvyṛdhyate na
analyzed: pāpaḥ yān syāt sakṛt eva hotavyāḥ na paśubhiḥ vyṛdhyate na

original: pāpīyānbhavatyaṣṭācatvāriṃśataṃ juhotyaṣṭācatvāriṃśadakṣarā jagatī jāgatāḥ paśavo
analyzed: pāpīyān bhavati aṣṭācatvāriṃśatam juhoti aṣṭācatvāriṃśat akṣarā jagatī jāgatāḥ paśavaḥ

original: jagatyaivāsmai paśūnavarunddha ekamatiriktaṃ juhoti tasmādekaḥ prajāsvardhukaḥ 13.1.4.[1]
analyzed: jagatyā eva asmai paśūn avarunddhe ekam atiriktam juhoti tasmāt ekaḥ prajāsu ardhukaḥ

original: prajāpatiraśvamedhamasṛjata so'smātsṛṣṭaḥ parāṅaitsa diśo'nuprāviśattaṃ devāḥ
analyzed: prajāpatiḥ aśvamedham asṛjata saḥ usmāt sṛṣṭaḥ parāṅ ait sa diśaḥ anuprāviśat tam devāḥ

original: praiṣamaicaṃstamiṣṭibhiranuprāyuñjata
analyzed: praiṣam aican tam iṣṭibhiḥ anuprāyuñjata

original: tamiṣṭibhiranvaicaṃstamiṣṭibhiranvavindanyadiṣṭibhiryajate'śvameva tanmedhyaṃ
analyzed: tam iṣṭibhiḥ anvaican tam iṣṭibhiḥ anvavindan yat iṣṭibhiḥ yajata īśvam eva tat medhyam

original: yajamāno'nvicati 13.1.4.[2]
analyzed: yajamānaḥ unvicati

original: sāvitryo bhavanti iyaṃ vai savitā yo vā asyāṃ nilayate yo'nyatraityasyāṃ vāva
analyzed: sāvitryaḥ bhavanti iyam vai savitā yaḥ vai asyām nilayate yaḥ ni atra eti asyām vāva

original: tamanuvindanti na vā imāṃ kaścana tiryaṅnordhvo'tyetumarhati yatsāvitryo
analyzed: tam anuvindanti na vai imām kaścana tiryaṅ na ūrdhvā utyetum arhati yat sāvitryaḥ

original: bhavantyaśvasyaivānuvittyai 13.1.4.[3]
analyzed: bhavanti aśvasya eva anuvittyai

original: tadāhuḥ pra vā etadaśvo mīyate yatparāṅeti na hyenam pratyāvartayantīti yatsāyaṃ
analyzed: tat āhuḥ pra vai etat aśvaḥ mīyate yat parāṅā iti na hi enam pratyāvartayanti iti yat sāyam

original: dhṛtīrjuhoti kṣemo vai dhṛtiḥ kṣemo rātriḥ kṣemeṇaivainaṃ dādhāra tasmātsāyam
analyzed: dhṛtīḥ juhoti kṣemaḥ vai dhṛtiḥ kṣemaḥ rātriḥ kṣemeṇa eva enam dādhāra tasmāt sāyam

original: manuṣyāśca paśavaśca kṣemyā bhavantyatha yatprātariṣṭibhiryajata icatyevainaṃ
analyzed: manuṣyāḥ ca paśavaḥ ca kṣemyāḥ bhavanti atha yat prātariṣṭibhiḥ yajate icati eva enam

original: tattasmāddivā naṣṭaiṣa eti yadveva sāyaṃ dhṛtīrjuhoti prātariṣṭibhiryajate
analyzed: tat tasmāt divā naṣṭa eṣaḥ eti yat u eva sāyam dhṛtīḥ juhoti prātar iṣṭibhiḥ yajate

original: yogakṣemameva tadyajamānaḥ kalpayate tasmādyatraitena yajñena yajante kLptaḥ
analyzed: yogakṣemam eva tat yajamānaḥ kalpayate tasmāt yatra etena yajñena yajante klptaḥ

original: prajānāṃ yogakṣemo bhavati 13.1.5.[1]
analyzed: prajānām yogakṣemaḥ bhavati

original: apa vā etasmāt śrī rāṣṭraṃ krāmati yo'śvamedhena yajate yadā vai puruṣaḥ śriyaṃ
analyzed: apa vai etasmāt śrī rāṣṭram krāmati yā aśvamedhena yajate yadā vai puruṣaḥ śriyam

original: gacati vīṇāsmai vādyate brāhmaṇau vīṇāgāthinau saṃvatsaraṃ gāyataḥ śriyai vā
analyzed: gacati vīṇā asmai vādyate brāhmaṇau vīṇā gāthinau saṃvatsaram gāyataḥ śriyai vā

original: etadrūpaṃ yadvīṇā śriyamevāsmiṃstaddhattaḥ 13.1.5.[2]
analyzed: etat rūpam yat vīṇā śriyam eva asmin tat dhattaḥ

original: tadāhuḥ yadubhau brāhmaṇau gāyetāmapāsmātkṣatraṃ krāmedbrahmaṇo vā
analyzed: tat āhuḥ yat ubhau brāhmaṇau gāyetām apa asmāt kṣatram krāmet brahmaṇaḥ vā

original: etadrūpaṃ yadbrāhmaṇo na vai brahmaṇi kṣatraṃ ramata iti 13.1.5.[3]
analyzed: etat rūpam yat brāhmaṇaḥ na vai brahmaṇi kṣatram ramate iti

original: yadubhau rājanyau apāsmādbrahmavarcasaṃ krāmetkṣatrasya vā etadrūpaṃ
analyzed: yat ubhau rājanyau apa asmāt brahmavarcasam krāmet kṣatrasya vai etat rūpam

original: yadrājanyo na vai kṣatre brahmavarcasaṃ ramata iti brāhmaṇo'nyo gāyati
analyzed: yat rājanyaḥ na vai kṣatre brahmavarcasam ramate iti brāhmaṇaḥ ūnyaḥ gāyati

original: rājanyo'nyo brahma vai brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatraṃ rājanyastadasya brahmaṇā ca kṣatreṇa
analyzed: rājanyaḥ anyaḥ brahma vai brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatram rājanyaḥ tat asya brahmaṇā ca kṣatreṇa

original: cobhayataḥ śrīḥ parigṛhītā bhavati 13.1.5.[4]
analyzed: ca ubhayatas śrīḥ parigṛhītā bhavati

original: tadāhuḥ yadubhau divā gāyetām prabhraṃśukāsmācrīḥ syādbrahmaṇo vā etadrūpaṃ
analyzed: tat āhuḥ yat ubhau divā gāyetām prabhraṃśukā asmācrīḥ syāt brahmaṇaḥ vai etat rūpam

original: yadaharyadā vai rājā kāmayate'tha brāhmaṇaṃ jināti pāpīyāṃstu bhavati 13.1.5.[5]
analyzed: yat ahar yadā vai rājā kāmayate itha brāhmaṇam jināti pāpīyān tu bhavati

original: yadubhau naktam apāsmādbrahmavarcasaṃ krāmetkṣatrasya vā etadrūpaṃ
analyzed: yat ubhau naktam apa asmāt brahmavarcasam krāmet kṣatrasya vai etat rūpam

original: yadrātrirna vai kṣatre brahmavarcasaṃ ramata iti divā brāhmaṇo gāyati naktaṃ
analyzed: yat rātriḥ na vai kṣatre brahmavarcasam ramate iti divā brāhmaṇaḥ gāyati naktam

original: rājanyastatho hāsya brahmaṇā ca kṣatreṇa cobhayataḥ śrīḥ parigṛhītā bhavatīti 13.1.5.[6]
analyzed: rājanyaḥ tathā u ha asya brahmaṇā ca kṣatreṇa ca ubhayatas śrīḥ parigṛhītā bhavati iti

original: ayajatetyadadāditi brāhmaṇo gāyatīṣṭāpūrtaṃ vai brāhmaṇasyeṣṭāpūrtenaivainaṃ sa
analyzed: ayajata iti adadāt iti brāhmaṇaḥ gāyati iṣṭāpūrtam vai brāhmaṇasya iṣṭāpūrtena eva enam sa

original: samardhayatītyayudhyatetyamuṃ saṃgrāmamajayaditi rājanyo yuddhaṃ vai
analyzed: samardhayati iti ayudhyata iti amum saṃgrāmam ajayat iti rājanyaḥ yuddham vai

original: rājanyasya vīryaṃ vīryeṇaivainaṃ sa samardhayati tisro'nyo gāthā gāyati tisro'nyaḥ
analyzed: rājanyasya vīryam vīryeṇa eva enam sa samardhayati tisraḥ anyaḥ gāthāḥ gāyati tisraḥ anyaḥ

original: ṣaṭ sampadyante ṣaḍṛtavaḥ saṃvatsara ṛtuṣveva saṃvatsare pratitiṣṭhati tābhyāṃ

original: śataṃ dadāti śatāyurvai puruṣaḥ śatendriya āyurevendriyaṃ vīryamātmandhatte 13.1.6.[1]
analyzed: śatam dadāti śata āyuḥ vai puruṣaḥ śata indriyaḥ āyuḥ eva indriyam vīryam ātman dhatte

original: vibhūrmātrā prabhūḥ pitreti iyaṃ vai mātāsau pitābhyāmevainam paridadātyaśvo'si
analyzed: vibhūḥ mātrā prabhūḥ pitrā iti iyam vai mātā asau pitā ābhyām eva enam paridadāti aśvā usi

original: hayo'sīti śāstyevainaṃ tattasmāciṣṭāḥ prajā jāyante'tyo'si mayo'sītyatyevainaṃ nayati
analyzed: hayā usi iti śāsti eva enam tat tasmāt āciṣṭāḥ prajāḥ jāyanta iti ā usi mayā usi iti ati eva enam nayati

analyzed: tasmāt aśvaḥ paśūnām śraiṣṭhyam gacati arvā asi saptiḥ asi vājī asi iti

original: yathāyajurevaitadvṛṣāsi nṛmaṇā asīti mithunatvāya yayurnāmāsi śiśurnāmāsītyetadvā
analyzed: yathāyajus eva etat vṛṣā asi nṛmaṇāḥ asi iti mithuna tvāya yayuḥ nāma asi śiśuḥ nāma asi iti etat vā

original: aśvasya priyaṃ nāmadheyam priyeṇaivainaṃ nāmnābhivadati tasmādapyāmitrau
analyzed: aśvasya priyam nāmadheyam priyeṇa eva enam nāmnā abhivadati tasmāt api āmitrau

original: saṃgatya nāmnā cedabhivadato'nyo'nyaṃ sameva jānāte 13.1.6.[2]
analyzed: saṃgatya nāmnā ced abhivadataḥ anyonyam sam eva jānāte

original: ādityānām patvānvihīti ādityānevainaṃ gamayati devā āśāpālā etaṃ devebhyo'śvam
analyzed: ādityānām patvā anvihi iti ādityān eva enam gamayati devāḥ āśā pālāḥ etam devebhyaḥ ūśvam

original: medhāya prokṣitaṃ rakṣateti śataṃ vai talpyā rājaputrā āśāpālāstebhya evainam
analyzed: medhāya prokṣitam rakṣata iti śatam vai talpyāḥ rāja putrāḥ āśā pālāḥ tebhyaḥ eva enam

original: paridadātīha rantiriha ramatāmiha dhṛtiriha svadhṛtiḥ svāheti
analyzed: paridadāti iha rantiḥ iha ramatām iha dhṛtiḥ iha svadhṛtiḥ svāhā iti

original: saṃvatsaramāhutīrjuhoti ṣoḍaśa navatīretā vā aśvasya bandhanaṃ tābhirevainam
analyzed: saṃvatsaram āhutīḥ juhoti ṣoḍaśa navatīḥ etāḥ vai aśvasya bandhanam tābhiḥ eva enam

original: badhnāti tasmādaśvaḥ pramukto bandhanamāgacati ṣoḍaśa navatīretā vā aśvasya
analyzed: badhnāti tasmāt aśvaḥ pramuktaḥ bandhanam āgacati ṣoḍaśa navatīḥ etāḥ vai aśvasya

original: bandhanaṃ tābhirevainam badhnāti tasmādaśvaḥ pramukto bandhanaṃ na jahāti 13.1.6.[3]
analyzed: bandhanam tābhiḥ eva enam badhnāti tasmāt aśvaḥ pramuktaḥ bandhanam na jahāti

original: rāṣṭraṃ vā aśvamedhaḥ rāṣṭra ete vyāyacante ye'śvaṃ rakṣanti teṣāṃ ya udṛcaṃ
analyzed: rāṣṭram vai aśvamedhaḥ rāṣṭre ete vyāyacante ye īśvam rakṣanti teṣām yaḥ udṛcam

original: yo'balo'śvamedhena yajate yadyamitrā aśvaṃ vinderanyajño'sya vicidyeta
analyzed: yobalā uśvamedhena yajate yadi amitrāḥ aśvam vinderan yajñaḥ usya vicidyeta

analyzed: pāpīyān sya ācatam kavacinaḥ rakṣanti yajñasya saṃtatyai a vyavacedāya na

original: vibhajya devatāṃ juhoti tryāvṛto vai devāstryāvṛta ime lokā ṛddhyāmeva vīrya eṣu

original: lokeṣu pratitiṣṭhati 13.1.7.[3]
analyzed: lokeṣu pratitiṣṭhati

analyzed: ekaviṃśatiḥ sampadyante dvādaśa māsāḥ pañca ṛtavaḥ trayaḥ ime lokāḥ asau āditya

analyzed: tat svārājyam aśnute

analyzed: prāṇān dīkṣām avarunddhe pūrṇāhutim uttamām juhoti pratyuttabdhyai sayuj tvāya

analyzed: vaiśvadevāni udayacan yat vaiśvadevāni juhoti aśvamedhasya eva udyatyai

analyzed: pūrvāsām brāhmaṇam tat atra

analyzed: adityai svāhā adityai mahyai svāhā adityai su mṛḍīkāyai svāhā iti iyam vā

analyzed: aditiḥ anayā eva enam udyacati

analyzed: sarasvatī vācā eva enam udyacati

analyzed: paśubhiḥ eva enam udyacati

analyzed: vai pūrṇāhutiḥ asyām eva antatas pratitiṣṭhati

original: ā brahman brāhmaṇo brahmavarcasī jāyatāmiti brāhmaṇa eva brahmavarcasaṃ

original: sabheyo yuveti eṣa vai sabheyo yuvā yaḥ prathamavayasī tasmātprathamavayasī
analyzed: sabheyaḥ yuvā iti eṣa vai sabheyaḥ yuvā yaḥ prathamavayasī tasmāt prathamavayasī

original: strīṇām priyo bhāvukaḥ 13.1.9.[9]
analyzed: strīṇām priyaḥ bhāvukaḥ

original: āsya yajamānasya vīro jāyatāmiti yajamānasyaiva prajāyāṃ vīryaṃ dadhāti
analyzed: ā asya yajamānasya vīraḥ jāyatām iti yajamānasya eva prajāyām vīryam dadhāti

analyzed: nikāme naḥ parjanyaḥ varṣatu iti nikāmenikāme vai tatra parjanyaḥ varṣati yatra etena

analyzed: tatra oṣadhayaḥ pacyante yatra etena yajñena yajante yogakṣemaḥ naḥ kalpatām iti

analyzed: yogakṣemaḥ vai tatra kalpate yatra etena yajñena yajante tasmāt yatra etena yajñena

analyzed: yajante klptaḥ prajānām yogakṣemaḥ bhavati

original: prajāpatirdevebhyo yajñānvyādiśat sa ātmannaśvamedhamadhatta te devāḥ

original: prajāpatimabruvanneṣa vai yajño yadaśvamedho'pi no'trāstu bhaga iti tebhya
analyzed: prajāpatim abruvan eṣa vai yajñaḥ yat aśvamedhaḥ api na utra astu bhagaḥ iti tebhyaḥ

original: etānannahomānkalpayadyadannahomānjuhoti devāneva tatprīṇāti 13.2.1.[2]
analyzed: etān annahomān kalpayat yat annahomān juhoti devān eva tat prīṇāti

analyzed: prajāpatiḥ aśvamedham asṛjata saḥ usmāt sṛṣṭaḥ parāṅ ait sa paṅktiḥ bhūtvā saṃvatsaram

original: prāviśatte'rdhamāsā abhavaṃstam pañcadaśibhiranuprāyuṅkta tamāpnottamāptvā
analyzed: prāviśat te ardha māsāḥ abhavan tam pañcadaśibhiḥ anuprāyuṅkta tam āpnot tam āptvā

original: pañcadaśibhiravārunddhārdhamāsānāṃ vā eṣā pratimā yatpañcadaśino
analyzed: pañcadaśibhiḥ avārunddha ardha māsānām vai eṣā pratimā yat pañcadaśinā

original: yatpañcadaśina ālabhate'rdhamāsāneva tairyajamāno'varunddhe 13.2.5.[2]
analyzed: yat pañcadaśinaḥ ālabhate ṛdha māsān eva taiḥ yajamānaḥ uvarunddhe

original: tadāhuḥ anavaruddho vā etasya saṃvatsaro bhavati yo'nyatra cāturmāsyebhyaḥ
analyzed: tat āhuḥ an avaruddhaḥ vai etasya saṃvatsaraḥ bhavati yaḥ ni atra cāturmāsyebhyaḥ

original: saṃvatsaraṃ tanuta ityeṣa vai sākṣātsaṃvatsaro yaccāturmāsyāni
analyzed: saṃvatsaram tanute iti eṣa vai sākṣāt saṃvatsaraḥ yat cāturmāsyāni

original: yaccāturmāsyānpaśūnālabhate sākṣādeva tatsaṃvatsaramavarunddhe vi vā eṣa prajayā
analyzed: yat cāturmāsyān paśūn ālabhate sākṣāt eva tat saṃvatsaram avarunddhe vi vai eṣa prajayā

original: paśubhirṛdhyate'pa svargaṃ lokaṃ rādhnoti yo'nyatraikādaśinebhyaḥ saṃvatsaraṃ
analyzed: paśubhiḥ ṛdhyata īpa svargam lokam rādhnoti yaḥ nyatra ekādaśinebhyaḥ saṃvatsaram

original: tanuta ityaiṣa vai samprati svargo loko yadekādaśinī prajā vai paśava ekādaśinī
analyzed: tanute iti ā eṣa vai samprati svargaḥ lokaḥ yat ekādaśinī prajāḥ vai paśavaḥ ekādaśinī

original: yadaikādaśinānpaśūnālabhate na svargaṃ lokamaparādhnoti na prajayā
analyzed: yadā aikādaśinān paśūn ālabhate na svargam lokam aparādhnoti na prajayā

original: paśubhirvyṛdyate 13.2.5.[3]
analyzed: paśubhiḥ vyṛdyate

original: prajāpatirvirājamasṛjata sāsmātsṛṣṭā parācyetsāśvam medhyam prāviśattāṃ
analyzed: prajāpatiḥ virājam asṛjata sā asmāt sṛṣṭā parācyet sā aśvam medhyam prāviśat tām

original: daśibhiranuprāyuṅkta tāmāpnottāmāptvā daśibhiravārunddha yaddaśina ālabhate
analyzed: daśibhiḥ anuprāyuṅkta tām āpnot tām āptvā daśibhiḥ avārunddha yat daśine ālabhate

original: virājameva tairyajamāno'varunddhe śatamālabhate śatāyurvai puruṣaḥ śatendriya
analyzed: virājam eva taiḥ yajamānaḥ uvarunddhe śatam ālabhate śata āyuḥ vai puruṣaḥ śata indriya

original: āyurevendriyaṃ vīryamātmandhatte 13.2.5.[4]
analyzed: āyuḥ eva indriyam vīryam ātman dhatte

original: ekādaśa daśata ālabhate ekādaśākṣarā vai triṣṭubindriyamu vai vīryaṃ
analyzed: ekādaśa daśatas ālabhate ekādaśa akṣarā vai triṣṭubh indriyam u vai vīryam

original: triṣṭubindriyasyaiva vīryasyāvaruddhyā ekādaśa daśata ālabhate daśa vai paśoḥ prāṇā
analyzed: triṣṭubh indriyasya eva vīryasya avaruddhyai ekādaśa daśatas ālabhate daśa vai paśoḥ prāṇā

original: ātmaikādaśaḥ prāṇaireva paśūntsamardhayati vaiśvadevā bhavanti vaiśvadevo vā
analyzed: ātmā ekādaśaḥ prāṇaiḥ eva paśūn samardhayati vaiśvadevāḥ bhavanti vaiśvadevaḥ vā

original: aśvo'śvasyaiva sarvatvāya bahurūpā bhavanti tasmādbahurūpāḥ paśavo nānārūpā
analyzed: aśva uśvasya eva sarva tvāya bahu rūpāḥ bhavanti tasmāt bahu rūpāḥ paśavaḥ nānā rūpā

original: bhavanti tasmānnānārūpāḥ paśavaḥ 13.2.6.[1]
analyzed: bhavanti tasmāt nānā rūpāḥ paśavaḥ

original: yuñjanti bradhnamaruṣaṃ carantamiti asau vā ādityo bradhno'ruṣo'mumevāsmā
analyzed: yuñjanti bradhnam aruṣam carantam iti asau vai ādityaḥ bradhna uruṣaḥ umum eva asmai

original: ādityaṃ yunakti svargasya lokasya samaṣṭyai 13.2.6.[2]
analyzed: ādityam yunakti svargasya lokasya samaṣṭyai

original: tadāhuḥ parāṅvā etasmādyajña eti yasya paśurupākṛto'nyatra vederetītyetaṃ
analyzed: tat āhuḥ parāṅ vai etasmāt yajñaḥ eti yasya paśuḥ upākṛtaḥ anyatra vedeḥ eti iti etam

original: stotaranena pathā punaraśvamāvartayāsi na iti vāyurvai stotā tamevāsmā
analyzed: stotar anena pathā punar aśvam āvartayāsi naḥ iti vāyuḥ vai stotā tam eva asmai

original: etatparastāddadhāti tathā nātyeti 13.2.6.[3]
analyzed: etat parastāt dadhāti tathā na atyeti

original: apa vā etasmāt teja indriyam paśavaḥ śrīḥ krāmanti yo'śvamedhena yajate 13.2.6.[4]
analyzed: apa vai etasmāt tejaḥ indriyam paśavaḥ śrīḥ krāmanti yā uśvamedhena yajate

original: vasavastvāñjantu gāyatreṇa candaseti mahiṣyabhyanakti tejo vā ājyaṃ tejo gāyatrī
analyzed: vasavaḥ tvā añjantu gāyatreṇa candasā iti mahiṣī abhyanakti tejaḥ vai ājyam tejaḥ gāyatrī

original: tejasī evāsmintsamīcī dadhāti 13.2.6.[5]
analyzed: tejasī eva asmin samīcī dadhāti

original: rudrāstvāñjantu traiṣṭubhena candaseti vāvātā tejo vā ājyamindriyaṃ
analyzed: rudrāḥ tvā añjantu traiṣṭubhena candasā iti vāvātā tejaḥ vai ājyam indriyam

original: triṣṭuptejaścaivāsminnindriyaṃ ca samīcī dadhāti 13.2.6.[6]
analyzed: triṣṭubh tejaḥ ca eva asmin indriyam ca samīcī dadhāti

original: ādityāstvāñjantu jāgatena candaseti parivṛktā tejo vā ājyam paśavo jagatī
analyzed: ādityāḥ tvā añjantu jāgatena candasā iti parivṛktā tejaḥ vai ājyam paśavaḥ jagatī

original: tejaścaivāsminpaśūṃśca samīcī dadhāti 13.2.6.[7]
analyzed: tejaḥ ca eva asmin paśūn ca samīcī dadhāti

original: patnyo'bhyañjanti śriyai vā etadrūpaṃ yatpatnyaḥ śriyamevāsmiṃstaddadhati
analyzed: patnyaḥ abhyañjanti śriyai vai etat rūpam yat patnyaḥ śriyam eva asmin tat dadhati

original: nāsmātteja indriyam paśavaḥ śrīrapakrāmanti 13.2.6.[8]
analyzed: na asmāt tejaḥ indriyam paśavaḥ śrīḥ apakrāmanti

original: yathā vai haviṣo'hutasya skandet evametatpaśo skandati yasya niktasya lomāni
analyzed: yathā vai haviṣā hutasya skandet evam etat paśoḥ skandati yasya niktasya lomāni

original: śīyante yatkācānāvayanti lomānyevāsya sambharanti hiraṇmayā bhavanti tasyoktaṃ
analyzed: śīyante yat kācān āvayanti lomāni eva asya sambharanti hiraṇmayāḥ bhavanti tasya uktam

original: brāhmaṇamekaśa tamekaśataṃ kācānāvayanti śatāyurvai puruṣa ātmaikaśata
analyzed: brāhmaṇam ekaśa tam ekaśatam kācān āvayanti śata āyuḥ vai puruṣaḥ ātmā ekaśata

original: āyuṣyevātmanpratitiṣṭhati bhūrbhuvaḥ svariti prājāpatyābhirāvayanti prājāpatyo'śvaḥ
analyzed: āyuṣi eva ātman pratitiṣṭhati bhūḥ bhuvaḥ svar iti prājāpatyābhiḥ āvayanti prājāpatyā ūśvaḥ

original: svayaivainaṃ devatayā samardhayanti lājī3ñcācī3nyavye gavya
analyzed: svayā eva enam devatayā samardhayanti gavya

original: ityatiriktamannamaśvāyopāvaharati prajāmevānnādīṃ kuruta etadannamatta devā
analyzed: iti atiriktam annam aśvāya upāvaharati prajām eva annādīm kurute etat annam atta devā

original: etadannamaddhi prajāpata iti prajāmevānnādyena samardhayati 13.2.6.[9]
analyzed: etat annam addhi prajāpate iti prajām eva annādyena samardhayati

original: apa vā etasmāt tejo brahmavarcasaṃ krāmati yo'śvamedhena yajate hotā ca brahmā
analyzed: apa vai etasmāt tejaḥ brahmavarcasam krāmati yā uśvamedhena yajate hotā ca brahmā

original: ca brahmodyaṃ vadata āgneyo vai hotā bārhaspatyo brahmā brahma
analyzed: ca brahmodyam vadataḥ āgneyaḥ vai hotā bārhaspatyaḥ brahmā brahma

original: bṛhaspatistejaścaivāsminbrahmavarcasaṃ ca samīcī dhatto yūpamabhito vadato
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ tejaḥ ca eva asmin brahmavarcasam ca samīcī dhattaḥ yūpam abhitas vadataḥ

original: yajamāno vai yūpo yajamānamevaitattejasā ca brahmavarcasena cobhayataḥ
analyzed: yajamānaḥ vai yūpaḥ yajamānam eva etat tejasā ca brahmavarcasena ca ubhayatas

original: paridhattaḥ 13.2.6.[10]
analyzed: paridhattaḥ

original: kaḥ svidekākī caratīti asau vā āditya ekākī caratyeṣa brahmavarcasam
analyzed: kaḥ svid ekākī carati iti asau vai ādityaḥ ekākī carati eṣa brahmavarcasam

original: brahmavarcasamevāsmiṃstaddhattaḥ 13.2.6.[11]
analyzed: brahmavarcasam eva asmin tat dhattaḥ

original: ka u svijjāyate punariti candramā vai jāyate punarāyurevāsmiṃstaddhattaḥ 13.2.6.[12]
analyzed: kaḥ u svid jāyate punar iti candramāḥ vai jāyate punar āyuḥ eva asmin tat dhattaḥ

original: kiṃ sviddhimasya bheṣajamiti agnirvai himasya bheṣajaṃ teja evāsmiṃstaddhattaḥ 13.2.6.[13]
analyzed: kim svid himasya bheṣajam iti agniḥ vai himasya bheṣajam tejaḥ eva asmin tat dhattaḥ

original: kimvāvapanam mahaditi ayaṃ vai lokaṃ āvapanam mahadasminneva loke
analyzed: kim u āvapanam mahat iti ayam vai lokam āvapanam mahat asmin eva loke

original: pratitiṣṭhati 13.2.6.[14]
analyzed: pratitiṣṭhati

original: kā svidāsītpūrvacittiriti dyaurvai vṛṣṭiḥ pūrvacittirdivameva vṛṣṭimavarunddhe 13.2.6.[15]
analyzed: kā svid āsīt pūrvacittiḥ iti dyauḥ vai vṛṣṭiḥ pūrvacittiḥ divam eva vṛṣṭim avarunddhe

original: kiṃ svidāsīdbṛhadvaya iti aśvo vai bṛhadvaya āyurevāvarunddhe 13.2.6.[16]
analyzed: kim svid āsīt bṛhat vayaḥ iti aśvaḥ vai bṛhat vayaḥ āyuḥ eva avarunddhe

original: kā svidāsītpilippileti śrīrvai pilippilā śriyamevāvarunddhe 13.2.6.[17]
analyzed: kā svid āsīt pilippilā iti śrīḥ vai pilippilā śriyam eva avarunddhe

original: kā svidāsītpiśaṃgileti ahorātre vai piśaṃgile ahorātrayoreva pratitiṣṭhati 13.2.7.[1]
analyzed: kā svid āsīt piśaṃgilā iti ahar rātre vai piśaṃgile ahar rātrayoḥ eva pratitiṣṭhati

original: niyukteṣu paśuṣu prokṣaṇīradhvaryurādatte'śvam prokṣiṣyannanvārabdhe
analyzed: niyukteṣu paśuṣu prokṣaṇīḥ adhvaryuḥ ādatte īśvam prokṣiṣyan anvārabdhe

original: yajamāna ādhvarikaṃ yajuranudrutyāśvamedhikaṃ yajuḥ pratipadyate 13.2.7.[2]
analyzed: yajamānaḥ ādhvarikam yajuḥ anudrutya āśvamedhikam yajuḥ pratipadyate

original: vāyuṣṭvā pacatairavatviti vāyurevainam pacatyasitagrīvaścāgairityagnirvā
analyzed: vāyuḥ tvā pacataiḥ avatu iti vāyuḥ eva enam pacati asita grīvaḥ ca agaiḥ iti agniḥ vā

analyzed: asita grīvā ugniḥ eva enam cāgaiḥ pacati

original: nyagrodhaścamasairiti yatra vai devā yajñenāyajanta ta etāṃścamasānnyaubjaṃste
analyzed: nyagrodhaḥ camasaiḥ iti yatra vai devāḥ yajñena ayajanta te etān camasān nyaubjan te

original: nyañco nyagrodhā rohanti 13.2.7.[4]
analyzed: nyañcaḥ nyagrodhāḥ rohanti

analyzed: śalmaliḥ vṛddhyā iti śalmalau vṛddhim dadhāti tasmāt a calmaliḥ vanaspatīnām varṣiṣtham

original: vardhate 13.2.7.[5]
analyzed: vardhate

original: eṣa sya rāthyo vṛṣeti aśvenaiva rathaṃ sampādayati tasmādaśvo nānyadrathādvahati 13.2.7.[6]
analyzed: eṣa sya rāthyaḥ vṛṣā iti aśvena eva ratham sampādayati tasmāt aśvaḥ na anyat rathāt vahati

original: ṣaḍbhiścaturbhiredaganniti tasmādaśvastribhistiṣṭhaṃstiṣṭhatyatha yuktaḥ sarvaiḥ
analyzed: ṣaḍbhiḥ caturbhiḥ ā id agan iti tasmāt aśvaḥ tribhiḥ tiṣṭhan tiṣṭhati atha yuktaḥ sarvaiḥ

original: padbhiḥ samamāyute 13.2.7.[7]
analyzed: padbhiḥ samam āyute

original: brahmākṛṣṇaśca no'vatviti candramā vai brahmākṛṣṇaścandramasa evainam
analyzed: brahma akṛṣṇaḥ ca naḥ vatu iti candramāḥ vai brahma akṛṣṇaḥ candramase eva enam

original: paridadāti namo'gnaya ityagnaya eva namaskaroti 13.2.7.[8]
analyzed: paridadāti namaḥ agnaye iti agnaye eva namaskaroti

original: saṃśito raśminā ratha iti raśminaiva rathaṃ sampādayati tasmādrathaḥ paryuto
analyzed: saṃśitaḥ raśminā rathaḥ iti raśminā eva ratham sampādayati tasmāt rathaḥ paryutaḥ

original: darśanīyatamo bhavati 13.2.7.[9]
analyzed: darśanīyatamaḥ bhavati

original: saṃśito raśminā haya iti raśminaivāśvaṃ sampādayati tasmādaśvo raśminā pratihṛto
analyzed: saṃśitaḥ raśminā hayaḥ iti raśminā eva aśvam sampādayati tasmāt aśvaḥ raśminā pratihṛtaḥ

analyzed: bhūyiṣṭham rocate

analyzed: saṃśitaḥ apsu apsujāḥ iti apsuyoniḥ vai aśvaḥ svayā eva enam yonyā samardhayati brahmā

original: somapurogava iti somapurogavamevainaṃ svargaṃ lokaṃ gamayati 13.2.7.[11]
analyzed: soma purogavaḥ iti soma purogavam eva enam svargam lokam gamayati

original: svayaṃ vājiṃstanvaṃ kalpayasveti svayaṃ rūpaṃ kuruṣva yādṛśamicasītyevainaṃ

analyzed: tat āha svayam yajasva iti svārājyam eva asmin dadhāti svayam juṣasva iti svayam lokam

original: rocayasva yāvantamicasītyevainaṃ tadāha mahimā te'nyena na saṃnaśa ityaśvameva
analyzed: rocayasva yāvantam icasi iti eva enam tat āha mahimā tenyena na saṃnaśe iti aśvam eva

original: mahimnā samardhayati 13.2.7.[12]
analyzed: mahimnā samardhayati

original: na vā u etanmriyase na riṣyasīti praśvāsayatyevainaṃ taddevāṃ ideṣi pathibhiḥ
analyzed: na vai u etat mriyase na riṣyasi iti praśvāsayati eva enam tat devān id eṣi pathibhiḥ

original: sugebhiriti devayānānevainam patho darśayati yatrāsate sukṛto yatra te yayuriti
analyzed: su gebhiḥ iti deva yānān eva enam pathaḥ darśayati yatra āsate su kṛtaḥ yatra te yayuḥ iti

original: sukṛdbhirevainaṃ salokaṃ karoti tatra tvā devaḥ savitā dadhātviti savitaivainaṃ svarge
analyzed: sukṛdbhiḥ eva enam sa lokam karoti tatra tvā devaḥ savitā dadhātu iti savitā eva enam svarge

original: loke dadhāti prajāpataye tvā juṣṭam prokṣāmītyupāṃśvathopagṛhṇāti 13.2.7.[13]
analyzed: loke dadhāti prajāpataye tvā juṣṭam prokṣāmi iti upāṃśu atha upagṛhṇāti

original: agniḥ paśurāsīt tenāyajanta sa etaṃ lokamajayadyasminnagniḥ sa te loko bhaviṣyati
analyzed: agniḥ paśuḥ āsīt tena ayajanta saḥ etam lokam ajayat yasmin agniḥ sa te lokaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: taṃ jeṣyasi pibaitā apa iti yāvānagnervijayo yāvāṃloko yāvadaiśvaryaṃ tāvāṃste
analyzed: tam jeṣyasi piba etāḥ apaḥ iti yāvān agneḥ vijayaḥ yāvān lokaḥ yāvat aiśvaryam tāvān te

analyzed: vijayaḥ tāvān lokaḥ tāvat aiśvaryam bhaviṣyati iti eva enam tat āha

original: vāyuḥ paśurāsīt tenāyajanta sa etaṃ lokamajayadyasminvāyuḥ sa te loko bhaviṣyati
analyzed: vāyuḥ paśuḥ āsīt tena ayajanta saḥ etam lokam ajayat yasmin vāyuḥ sa te lokaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: taṃ jeṣyasi pibaitā apa iti yāvānvāyorvijayo yāvāṃloko 13.2.7.[15]
analyzed: tam jeṣyasi piba etāḥ apaḥ iti yāvān vāyoḥ vijayaḥ

original: sūryaḥ paśurāsīt tenāyajanta sa etaṃ lokamajayadyasmintsūryaḥ sa te loko bhaviṣyati
analyzed: sūryaḥ paśuḥ āsīt tena ayajanta saḥ etam lokam ajayat yasmin sūryaḥ sa te lokaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: taṃ jeṣyasi pibaitā apa iti yāvāntsūryasya vijayo yāvāṃloko yāvadaiśvaryaṃ tāvāṃste
analyzed: tam jeṣyasi piba etāḥ apaḥ iti yāvān sūryasya vijayaḥ yāvān lokaḥ yāvat aiśvaryam tāvān te

original: vijayastāvāṃlokastāvadaiśvaryam bhaviṣyatītyevainaṃ tadāha tarpayitvāśvam punaḥ
analyzed: vijayaḥ tāvān lokaḥ tāvat aiśvaryam bhaviṣyati iti eva enam tat āha tarpayitvā aśvam punar

original: saṃskṛtya prokṣaṇīritarānpaśūnprokṣati tasyātaḥ 13.2.8.[1]
analyzed: saṃskṛtya prokṣaṇīḥ itarān paśūn prokṣati tasya atas

original: devā vā udañcaḥ svargaṃ lokaṃ na prājānaṃstamaśvaḥ prājānādyadaśvenodañco yanti
analyzed: devāḥ vai udañcaḥ svargam lokam na prājānan tam aśvaḥ prājānāt yat aśvena udañcaḥ yanti

original: svargasya lokasya prajñātyai vāso'dhivāsaṃ hiraṇyamityaśvāyopastṛṇanti yathā
analyzed: svargasya lokasya prajñātyai vāsaḥ adhivāsam hiraṇyam iti aśvāya upastṛṇanti yathā

original: nānyasmai paśave tasminnenamadhi saṃjñapayantyanyairevainaṃ
analyzed: na anyasmai paśave tasmin enam adhi saṃjñapayanti anyaiḥ eva enam

original: tatpaśubhirvyākurvanti 13.2.8.[2]

original: saṃsphurerannevamete stomāḥ samṛcante

analyzed: tu eva samṛddhaḥ syāt

original: tasya vidhā caturviṃśāḥ pavamānāḥ trivṛdabhyāvartam catuścatvāriṃśāḥ pavamānā
analyzed: tasya vidhā caturviṃśāḥ pavamānāḥ trivṛt abhyāvartam catuścatvāriṃśāḥ pavamānāḥ

original: ekviṃśānyājyāni triṇavānyukthānyekaviṃśāni pṛṣṭhāni ṣaṭtriṃśāḥ
analyzed: ekviṃśāni ājyāni triṇavāni ukthāni ekaviṃśāni pṛṣṭhāni ṣaṭtriṃśāḥ

original: pavamānāstrayastriṃśamabhyāvartamāgniṣṭomasāmādekaviṃśānyukthānyekaviṃśaḥ
analyzed: pavamānāḥ trayastriṃśam abhyāvartam ā agniṣṭoma sāmāt ekaviṃśāni ukthāni ekaviṃśaḥ

original: ṣoḍaśī pañcadaśī rātristrivṛtsandhiḥ 13.5.4.[21]
analyzed: ṣoḍaśī pañcadaśī rātriḥ trivṛt sandhiḥ

original: tadetadgāthayābhigītam śatānīkaḥ samantāsu medhyaṃ sātrājito hayam ādatta
analyzed: tat etat gāthayā abhigītam śatānīkaḥ samantāsu medhyam sātrājitaḥ hayam ādatta

original: yajñaṃ kāśīnām bharataḥ satvatāmiveti 13.5.4.[22]
analyzed: yajñam kāśīnām bharataḥ satvatām iva iti

original: atha dvitīyayā śvetaṃ samantāsu vaśaṃ carantaṃ śatānīko dhrṛtarāṣṭrasya medhyam
analyzed: atha dvitīyayā śvetam samantāsu vaśam carantam śatānīkaḥ dhrṛtarāṣṭrasya medhyam

original: ādāya sahvā daśamāsyamaśvaṃ śatānīko govinatena heja iti 13.5.4.[23]
analyzed: ādāya sahvā daśamāsyam aśvam śatānīkaḥ govinatena ha īje iti

original: atha caturthyā mahadadya bharatānāṃ na pūrve nāpare janāḥ divam martya-iva
analyzed: atha caturthyā mahat adya bharatānām na pūrve na apare janāḥ divam martyā eva

original: pakṣābhyāṃ nodāpuḥ saptamā navā iti 13.5.4.[24]
analyzed: pakṣābhyām na udāpuḥ saptamāḥ navāḥ iti

original: athāto dakṣiṇānām madhyam prati rāṣṭrasya yadanyadbhūmeśca puruṣebhyaśca
analyzed: atha atas dakṣiṇānām madhyam prati rāṣṭrasya yat anyat bhūmeḥ ca puruṣebhyaḥ ca

original: brāhmaṇasya ca vittātprācī digghoturdakṣiṇā brahmaṇaḥ
analyzed: brāhmaṇasya ca vittāt prācī diś hotuḥ dakṣiṇā brahmaṇaḥ

original: pratīcyadhvaryorudīcyudgātustadeva hotṛkā anvābhaktāḥ 13.5.4.[25]
analyzed: pratīcī adhvaryoḥ udīcī udgātuḥ tat eva hotṛkāḥ anvābhaktāḥ

original: udayanīyāyāṃ samsthitāyām ekaviṃśatim vaśā anūbandhyā ālabhate
analyzed: udayanīyāyām samsthitāyām ekaviṃśatim vaśāḥ anūbandhyāḥ ālabhate

original: maitrāvaruṇīrvaiśvadevīrbārhaspatyā etāsāṃ devatānāmāptyai tadyadbārhaspatyāntyā
analyzed: maitrāvaruṇīḥ vaiśvadevīḥ bārhaspatyāḥ etāsām devatānām āptyai tat yat bārhaspatyā antyā

original: bhavanti brahma vai bṛhaspatistadu brahmaṇyevāntataḥ pratitiṣṭhati 13.5.4.[26]
analyzed: bhavanti brahma vai bṛhaspatiḥ tat u brahmaṇi eva antatas pratitiṣṭhati

original: atha yadekaviṃśatirbhavanti ekaviṃśo vā eṣa ya eṣa tapati dvādaśa māsāḥ
analyzed: atha yat ekaviṃśatiḥ bhavanti ekaviṃśaḥ vai eṣa yaḥ eṣa tapati dvādaśa māsāḥ

original: pañcartavastraya ime lokā asāvāditya ekaviṃśa etāmabhisampadam 13.5.4.[27]
analyzed: pañca ṛtavaḥ trayaḥ ime lokāḥ asau ādityaḥ ekaviṃśaḥ etām abhisampadam

original: udavasānīyāyāṃ saṃsthitāyām catasraśca jāyāḥ kumārīm pañcamīṃ catvāri ca
analyzed: udavasānīyāyām saṃsthitāyām catasraḥ ca jāyāḥ kumārīm pañcamīm catvāri ca

original: śatānyanucarīṇāṃ yathāsamuditam dakṣiṇām dadati 13.5.4.[28]
analyzed: śatāni anucarīṇām yathāsamuditam dakṣiṇām dadati

original: athottaraṃ samvatsaramṛtupaśubhiryajate ṣaḍbhirāgneyairvasante
analyzed: atha uttaram samvatsaram ṛtu paśubhiḥ yajate ṣaḍbhiḥ āgneyaiḥ vasante

original: ṣaḍbhiraindrairgrīṣme ṣaḍbhiḥ pārjanyairvā mārutairvā varṣāsu
analyzed: ṣaḍbhiḥ aindraiḥ grīṣme ṣaḍbhiḥ pārjanyaiḥ vā mārutaiḥ vā varṣāsu

original: ṣaḍbhirmaitrāvaruṇaiḥ śaradi ṣaḍbhiraindrāvaiṣṇavairhemante
analyzed: ṣaḍbhiḥ maitrāvaruṇaiḥ śaradi ṣaḍbhiḥ aindrāvaiṣṇavaiḥ hemante

original: ṣaḍbhiraindrābārhaspatyaiḥ śiśire ṣaḍṛtavaḥ samvatsaraḥ ṛtuṣveva samvatsare
analyzed: ṣaḍbhiḥ aindrābārhaspatyaiḥ śiśire ṣaṭ ṛtavaḥ samvatsaraḥ ṛtuṣu eva samvatsare

original: pratitiṣṭhati ṣaṭtriṃśadete paśavo bhavanti ṣaṭtriṃśadakṣarā bṛhatī bṛhatyāmadhi
analyzed: pratitiṣṭhati ṣaṭtriṃśat ete paśavaḥ bhavanti ṣaṭtriṃśat akṣarā bṛhatī bṛhatyām adhi

original: svargo lokaḥ pratiṣṭhitastadvantato bṛhatyaiva candasā svarge loke pratitiṣṭhati 13.6.1.[1]
analyzed: svargaḥ lokaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ tadvat tatas bṛhatyā eva candasā svarge loke pratitiṣṭhati

original: puruṣo ha nārāyaṇo'kāmayata atitiṣṭheyaṃ sarvāṇi bhūtānyahamevedaṃ sarvaṃ
analyzed: puruṣaḥ ha nārāyaṇaḥ ukāmayata atitiṣṭheyam sarvāṇi bhūtāni aham eva idam sarvam

original: syāmiti sa etam puruṣamedham pañcarātram
analyzed: syām iti saḥ etam puruṣamedham pañca rātram

original: yajñakratumapaśyattamāharattenāyajata teneṣṭvātyatiṣṭhatsarvāṇi bhūtānīdaṃ
analyzed: yajñakratum apaśyat tam āharat tena ayajata tena iṣṭvā atyatiṣṭhat sarvāṇi bhūtāni idam

original: sarvamabhavadatitiṣṭhati sarvāṇi bhūtānīdaṃ sarvam bhavati ya evam
analyzed: sarvam abhavat atitiṣṭhati sarvāṇi bhūtāni idam sarvam bhavati yaḥ evam

original: vidvānpuruṣamedhena yajate yo vaitadevam veda 13.6.1.[2]
analyzed: vidvān puruṣamedhena yajate yaḥ vā etat evam veda

original: tasya trayoviṃśatirdīkṣāḥ dvādaśopasadaḥ pañca sutyāḥ sa eṣa catvāriṃśadrātraḥ
analyzed: tasya trayoviṃśatiḥ dīkṣāḥ dvādaśa upasadaḥ pañca sutyāḥ saḥ eṣa catvāriṃśat rātraḥ

original: sadīkṣopasatkaścatvāriṃśadakṣarā virāṭtadvirājamabhisampadyate tato virāḍajāyata
analyzed: sa dīkṣā upasatkaḥ catvāriṃśat akṣarā virāj tat virājam abhisampadyate tatas virāj ajāyata

original: virājo adhi pūruṣa ityeṣā vai sā virāḍetasyā evaitadvirājo yajñam puruṣaṃ janayati 13.6.1.[3]
analyzed: virājaḥ adhi pūruṣaḥ iti eṣā vai sā virāj etasyāḥ eva etat virājaḥ yajñam puruṣam janayati

original: tā vā etāḥ catasro daśato bhavanti tadyadetāścatasro daśato bhavantyeṣāṃ caiva
analyzed: tāḥ vai etāḥ catasraḥ daśatas bhavanti tat yat etāḥ catasraḥ daśatas bhavanti eṣām ca eva

original: lokānāmāptye diśāṃ cemameva lokam prathamayā daśatāpnuvannantarikṣaṃ
analyzed: lokānām āptye diśām ca imam eva lokam prathamayā daśatā āpnuvan antarikṣam

original: dvitīyayā divaṃ tṛtīyayā diśaścaturthyā tathaivaitadyajamāna imameva lokam
analyzed: dvitīyayā divam tṛtīyayā diśaḥ caturthyā tathā eva etat yajamānaḥ imam eva lokam

analyzed: prathamayā daśatā āpnoti antarikṣam dvitīyayā divam tṛtīyayā diśaḥ caturthyā etāvat vā

original: idaṃ sarvaṃ yāvādime ca lokā diśaśca sarvam puruṣamedhaḥ sarvasyāptyai
analyzed: idam sarvam yāvān āt ime ca lokāḥ diśaḥ ca sarvam puruṣamedhaḥ sarvasya āptyai

original: s/rvasyāvaruddhyai 13.6.1.[4]
analyzed: srvasya avaruddhyai

original: ekādaśāgniṣomīyāḥ paśava upavasathe teṣāṃ samānaṃ karmaikādaśa yūpā
analyzed: ekādaśa agniṣomīyāḥ paśavaḥ upavasathe teṣām samānam karma ekādaśa yūpā

original: ekādaśākṣarā triṣṭubvajrastriṣṭubvīryaṃ triṣṭubvajreṇaivaitadvīryeṇa yajamānaḥ

original: purastātpāpmānamapahate 13.6.1.[5]
analyzed: purastāt pāpmānam apahate

original: ekādaśināḥ sutyāsu paśavo bhavanti ekādaśākṣarā triṣṭubvajrastriṣṭubvīryaṃ
analyzed: ekādaśināḥ sutyāsu paśavaḥ bhavanti ekādaśa akṣarā triṣṭubh vajraḥ triṣṭubh vīryam

original: triṣṭubvajreṇaivaitadvīryeṇa yajamānaḥ purastātpāpmānamapahate 13.6.1.[6]
analyzed: triṣṭubh vajreṇa eva etat vīryeṇa yajamānaḥ purastāt pāpmānam apahate

original: yadvevaikādaśinā bhavanti ekādaśinī vā idaṃ sarvam prajāpatirhyekādaśinī sarvaṃ
analyzed: yat u eva ekādaśināḥ bhavanti ekādaśinī vai idam sarvam prajāpatiḥ hi ekādaśinī sarvam

original: hi prajāpatiḥ sarvam puruṣamedhaḥ sarvasyāptyai sarvasyāvaruddhyai 13.6.1.[7]
analyzed: hi prajāpatiḥ sarvam puruṣamedhaḥ sarvasya āptyai sarvasya avaruddhyai

original: sa vā eṣa puruṣamedhaḥ pañcarātro yajñakraturbhavati pāṅkto yajñaḥ pāṅktaḥ
analyzed: sa vai eṣa puruṣa medhaḥ pañca rātraḥ yajñakratuḥ bhavati pāṅktaḥ yajñaḥ pāṅktaḥ

analyzed: paśuḥ pañca ṛtavaḥ samvatsaraḥ yat kim ca pañcavidham adhidevatam adhyātmam

original: tadenena sarvamāpnoti 13.6.1.[8]
analyzed: tat enena sarvam āpnoti

original: tasyāgniṣṭomaḥ prathamamaharbhavati athokthyo'thātirātro'thokthyo'thāgniṣṭomaḥ
analyzed: tasya agniṣṭomaḥ prathamam ahar bhavati atha ukthyaḥ utha atirātraḥ utha ukthyaḥ utha agniṣṭomaḥ

original: sa vā eṣa ubhayatojyotirubhayataukthyaḥ 13.6.1.[9]
analyzed: sa vai eṣaḥ ubhayatojyotiḥ ubhayataukthyaḥ

original: yavamadhyaḥ pañcarātro bhavati ime vai lokāḥ puruṣamedha ubhayatojyotiṣo vā
analyzed: yava madhyaḥ pañca rātraḥ bhavati ime vai lokāḥ puruṣamedhaḥ ubhayatojyotiṣaḥ vā

original: ime lokā agnineta ādityenāmutastasmādubhayatojyotirannamukthya
analyzed: ime lokāḥ agninā itas ādityena amutas tasmāt ubhayatas jyotiḥ annam ukthya

original: ātmātirātrastadyadetā ukthyāvatirātramabhito bhavatastasmādayamātmānnena
analyzed: ātmā atirātraḥ tat yat etau ukthyau atirātram abhitas bhavataḥ tasmāt ayam ātmā annena

analyzed: parivṛḍhaḥ utha yat eṣa varṣiṣṭa ūti rātraḥ ūhnām sa madhye tasmāt yava madhyaḥ yute ha

original: vai dviṣantam bhrātrṛvyamayamevāsti nāsya dviṣanbhrātṛvya ityāhurya evam veda 13.6.1.[10]
analyzed: vai dviṣantam bhrātrṛvyam ayam eva asti na asya dviṣan bhrātṛvyaḥ iti āhuḥ yaḥ evam veda

original: tasyāsyameva lokaḥ prathamamahaḥ ayamasya loko vasanta
analyzed: tasya āsyam eva lokaḥ prathamam ahar ayam asya lokaḥ vasanta

original: ṛturyadūrdhvamasmāllokādarvācīnamantarikṣāttaddvitīyamahastadvasyāgrīṣma
analyzed: ṛtuḥ yat ūrdhvam asmāt lokāt arvācīnam antarikṣāt tat dvitīyam ahar tat vasya agrīṣma

original: ṛturantarikṣamevāsya madhyamamaharantarikṣamasya varṣāśaradāvṛtū
analyzed: ṛtuḥ antarikṣam eva asya madhyamam ahar antarikṣam asya varṣā śaradau ṛtū

original: yadūrdhvamntarikṣādarvācīnaṃ divastaccaturthamahastadvasya hemanta
analyzed: yat ūrdhvam antarikṣāt arvācīnam divaḥ tat caturtham ahar tat vasya hemanta

original: ṛturdyaurevāsya pañcamamahardyaurasya śiśira ṛturityadhidevatam 13.6.1.[11]
analyzed: ṛtuḥ dyauḥ eva asya pañcamam ahar dyauḥ asya śiśiraḥ ṛtuḥ iti adhidevatam

original: athādhyātmam pratiṣthaivāsya prathamamahaḥ pratiṣṭho asya vasanta
analyzed: atha adhyātmam pratiṣthā eva asya prathamam ahar pratiṣṭhā u asya vasanta

original: ṛturyadūrdhvam pratiṣṭhāyā avācīnam maddhyāttaddvitīyamahastadvasya grīṣma
analyzed: ṛtuḥ yat ūrdhvam pratiṣṭhāyāḥ avācīnam maddhyāt tat dvitīyam ahar tat vasya grīṣma

original: ṛturmadhyamevāsya madhyamamaharmadhyamasya varṣāśaradāvṛtū yadūrdhvam
analyzed: ṛtuḥ madhyam eva asya madhyamam ahar madhyamasya varṣā śaradau ṛtū yat ūrdhvam

original: madhyādavācīnam śīrṣṇastaccaturthamahastadvasya hemanta ṛtuḥ śira evāsya
analyzed: madhyāt avācīnam śīrṣṇaḥ tat caturtham ahar tat vasya hemantaḥ ṛtuḥ śiraḥ eva asya

original: pañcamamahaḥ śiro'sya śiśira ṛturevamime ca lokā samvatsaraścātmā ca
analyzed: pañcamam ahar śiraḥ asya śiśiraḥ ṛtuḥ evam ime ca lokā samvatsaraḥ ca ātmā ca

original: puruṣamedhamabhisampadyante sarvam vā ime lokāḥ sarvaṃ samvatsaraḥ
analyzed: puruṣamedham abhisampadyante sarvam vai ime lokāḥ sarvam samvatsaraḥ

original: sarvamātmā sarvam puruṣamedhaḥ sarvasyāptyai sarvasyāvaruddhyai 13.6.2.[1]
analyzed: sarvam ātmā sarvam puruṣamedhaḥ sarvasya āptyai sarvasya avaruddhyai

original: atha yasmātpuruṣamedho nāma ime vai lokāḥ pūrayameva puruṣo yo'yam pavate
analyzed: atha yasmāt puruṣamedhaḥ nāma ime vai lokāḥ pūḥ ayam eva puruṣaḥ yaḥ ayam pavate

original: so'syām puri śete tasmātpuruṣastasya yadeṣu lokeṣvannaṃ tadasyānnam
analyzed: saḥ usyām puri śete tasmāt puruṣaḥ tasya yat eṣu lokeṣu annam tat asya annam

original: medhastadyadasyaitadannam medhastasmātpuruṣamedho'tho
analyzed: medhaḥ tat yat asya etat annam medhaḥ tasmāt puruṣamedhaḥ utha

original: yadasminmedhyānpuruṣānālabhate tasmādveva puruṣamedhaḥ 13.6.2.[2]
analyzed: yat asmin medhyān puruṣān ālabhate tasmāt u eva puruṣamedhaḥ

original: tānvai madhyame'hannālabhate antarikṣam vai madhyamamaharantarikṣamu vai
analyzed: tān vai madhyam ehan ālabhate antarikṣam vai madhyamam ahar antarikṣam u vai

original: sarveṣām bhūtānāmāyatanamatho annam vā ete paśava udaram
analyzed: sarveṣām bhūtānām āyatanam atha u annam vai ete paśavaḥ udaram

original: madhyamamaharudare tadannaṃ dadhāti 13.6.2.[3]
analyzed: madhyamam ahar udare tat annam dadhāti

original: tānvai daśa-daśālabhate daśākṣarā virāḍvirāḍu kṛtsnamannaṃ
analyzed: tān vai daśa daśa ālabhate daśa akṣarā virāj virāju kṛtsnam annam

original: kṛtsnasyaivānnādyasyāvaruddhyai 13.6.2.[4]
analyzed: kṛtsnasya eva annādyasya avaruddhyai

original: ekādaśa daśata ālabhate ekādaśākṣarā triṣṭubvajrastriṣṭubvīryaṃ
analyzed: ekādaśa daśatas ālabhate ekādaśa akṣarā triṣṭubh vajraḥ triṣṭubh vīryam

original: triṣṭubvajreṇaivaitadvīryeṇa yajamāno madhyataḥ pāpmānamapahate 13.6.2.[5]
analyzed: triṣṭubh vajreṇa eva etat vīryeṇa yajamānaḥ madhyataḥ pāpmānam apahate

original: aṣṭācatvāriṃśatam madhyame yūpa ālabhate aṣṭācatvāriṃśadakṣarā jagatī jāgatāḥ
analyzed: aṣṭācatvāriṃśatam madhyame yūpe ālabhate aṣṭācatvāriṃśat akṣarā jagatī jāgatāḥ

original: paśavo jagatyaivāsmai paśūnavarunddhe 13.6.2.[6]
analyzed: paśavaḥ jagatyā eva asmai paśūn avarunddhe

original: ekādaśaikādaśetareṣu ekādaśākṣarā triṣṭubvajrastriṣṭubvīryaṃ
analyzed: ekādaśa ekādaśa itareṣu ekādaśa akṣarā triṣṭubh vajraḥ triṣṭubh vīryam

original: triṣṭubvajreṇaivaitadvīryeṇa yajamāno'bhitaḥ pāpmānamapahate 13.6.2.[7]
analyzed: triṣṭubh vajreṇa eva etat vīryeṇa yajamānaḥ ubhitas pāpmānam apahate

original: aṣṭā uttamānālabhate aṣṭākṣarā gāyatrī brahma gāyatrī tadbrahmaivaitadasya
analyzed: aṣṭau uttamān ālabhate aṣṭa akṣarā gāyatrī brahma gāyatrī tat brahma eva etat asya

original: sarvasyottamaṃ karoti tasmādbrahmāsya sarvasyottamamityāhuḥ 13.6.2.[8]
analyzed: sarvasya uttamam karoti tasmāt brahma asya sarvasya uttamam iti āhuḥ

original: te vai prājāpatyā bhavanti brahma vai prajāpatirbrāhmo hi
analyzed: te vai prājāpatyāḥ bhavanti brahma vai prajāpatiḥ brāhmaḥ hi

original: prajāpatistasmātprājāpatyā bhavanti 13.6.2.[9]
analyzed: prajāpatiḥ tasmāt prājāpatyāḥ bhavanti

original: sa vai paśūnupākariṣyan etāstisraḥ sāvitrīrāhutīrjuhoti deva
analyzed: sa vai paśūn upākariṣyan etāḥ tisraḥ sāvitrīḥ āhutīḥ juhoti deva

original: savitastatsaviturvareṇyam viśvāni deva savitariti savitāram prīṇāti so'smai prīta
analyzed: savitar tat savituḥ vareṇyam viśvāni deva savitar iti savitāram prīṇāti saḥ usmai prīta

original: etānpuruṣānprasauti tena prasūtānālabhate 13.6.2.[10]
analyzed: etān puruṣān prasauti tena prasūtān ālabhate

original: brahmaṇe brāhmaṇamālabhate brahma vai brāhmaṇo brahmeva tadbrahmaṇā
analyzed: brahmaṇe brāhmaṇam ālabhate brahma vai brāhmaṇaḥ brahma iva tat brahmaṇā

analyzed: samardhayati kṣatrāya rājanyam kṣatram vai rājanyaḥ kṣatram eva tat kṣatreṇa

analyzed: samardhayati marudbhyaḥ vaiśyam viśaḥ vai marutaḥ viśam eva tat viśā samardhayati

analyzed: tapase śūdram tapaḥ vai śūdraḥ tapaḥ eva tat tapasā samardhayati evam etāḥ devatāḥ

analyzed: ājyena juhoti tejaḥ vai ājyam tejasā eva asmin tat tejaḥ dadhāti ājyena juhoti etat vai

analyzed: devānām priyam dhāma yat ājyam priyeṇa eva enān dhāmnā samardhayati te enam

original: samṛddhāḥ samardhayanti sarvaiḥ kāmaiḥ 13.6.2.[12]
analyzed: samṛddhāḥ samardhayanti sarvaiḥ kāmaiḥ

analyzed: sarvam puruṣamedhaḥ sarvasya āptyai sarvasya avaruddhyai

analyzed: ittham asi ittham asi iti upastauti eva enam etat mahayati eva atha u yathā eṣa

analyzed: atha ha enam vāc abhyuvāda puruṣa mā santiṣṭhipaḥ yadi saṃsthāpayiṣyasi puruṣa

analyzed: devatāḥ aprīṇāt tāḥ enam prītāḥ aprīṇan sarvaiḥ kāmaiḥ

original: ājyena juhoti tejo vā ājyaṃ tejasaivāsmiṃstattejo dadhāti 13.6.2.[15]
analyzed: ājyena juhoti tejaḥ vai ājyam tejasā eva asmin tat tejaḥ dadhāti

original: triṣṭubvajreṇaivaitadvīryeṇa yajamāno madhyataḥ pāpmānamapahate
analyzed: triṣṭubh vajreṇa eva etat vīryeṇa yajamānaḥ madhyataḥ pāpmānam apahate

analyzed: pratīcī adhvaryoḥ udīcī udgātuḥ tat eva hotṛkāḥ anvābhaktāḥ

original: sarvavedasaṃ sarvam puruṣamedhaḥ sarvasyāptyai sarvasyāvaruddhyai 13.6.2.[20]
analyzed: sarvavedasam sarvam puruṣamedhaḥ sarvasya āptyai sarvasya avaruddhyai

original: athātmannagnī samārohya
analyzed: atha ātman agnī samārohya

analyzed: manuṣyebhyaḥ tiras bhavati yadi u grāme vivatset araṇyoḥ agnī

original: samārohyottaranārāyaṇenaivādityamupasthāya gṛheṣu pratyavasyedatha

analyzed: brahma vai svayambhu tapaḥ tapyata tat aikṣata na vai tapasi ānantyam asti hanta aham

analyzed: sa vai eṣa sarvamedhaḥ daśa rātraḥ yajñakratuḥ bhavati daśa akṣarā virāj virāj u

analyzed: huteṣu haviḥṣu

analyzed: hotṛkāḥ anvābhaktāḥ

original: yadyanusmareyuḥ 13.8.1.[3]
analyzed: yadi anusmareyuḥ

original: ayuṅgeṣu samvatsareṣu kuryāt ayuṅgaṃ hi pitṝṇāmekanakṣatra ekanakṣatraṃ hi

analyzed: śaradi kuryāt svadhā vai śarad svadhaḥ vai pitṝṇām annam tat enam anne svadhāyām

original: dadhāti māghe vā mā no'gham bhūditi nidāghe vā ni no'ghaṃ dhīyātā iti 13.8.1.[5]

original: sarvā ityetadevāsmai sarvaṃ kalpayatyetadasmai śivaṃ karoti 13.8.3.[6]
analyzed: sarvāḥ iti etat eva asmai sarvam kalpayati etat asmai śivam karoti

original: atha trayodaśa pādamātrya iṣṭakā alakṣaṇāḥ kṛtā bhavanti yā evāmūragnāviṣṭakāstā
analyzed: atha trayodaśa pāda mātryaḥ iṣṭakāḥ alakṣaṇāḥ kṛtāḥ bhavanti yāḥ eva amūḥ agnau iṣṭakāḥ tā

original: etā yajuṣā tā upadadhāti tūṣṇīmimā daivaṃ caiva tatpitryaṃ ca vyākaroti 13.8.3.[7]
analyzed: etāḥ yajuṣā tāḥ upadadhāti tūṣṇīm imāḥ daivam ca eva tat pitryam ca vyākaroti

original: trayodaśa bhavanti trayodaśa māsāḥ samvatsara ṛtuṣvevainametatsamvatsare
analyzed: trayodaśa bhavanti trayodaśa māsāḥ samvatsaraḥ ṛtuṣu eva enam etat samvatsare

original: pratiṣṭhāyām pratiṣṭhāpayati 13.8.3.[8]
analyzed: pratiṣṭhāyām pratiṣṭhāpayati

original: pādamātryo bhavanti pratiṣṭhā vai pādaḥ pratiṣṭhāmevāsmai karotyalakṣaṇā
analyzed: pāda mātryaḥ bhavanti pratiṣṭhā vai pādaḥ pratiṣṭhām eva asmai karoti alakṣaṇā

original: bhavanti tira-iva vai pitarastira-iva tadyadalakṣaṇaṃ tira eva tattiraḥ karoti 13.8.3.[9]
analyzed: bhavanti tirā eva vai pitaraḥ tirā eva tat yat alakṣaṇam tiras eva tat tiras karoti

original: tāsāmekām madhye prācīmupadadhāti sa ātmā tisraḥ
analyzed: tāsām ekām madhye prācīm upadadhāti saḥ ātmā tisraḥ

original: purastānmūrdhasa+hitāstacirastisro dakṣiṇataḥ sa dakṣiṇaḥ pakṣastisra uttarataḥ sa
analyzed: purastāt mūrdha sahitāḥ tisraḥ dakṣiṇatas sa dakṣiṇaḥ pakṣaḥ tisraḥ uttaratas sa

original: uttaraḥ pakṣastisraḥ paścāttatpucaṃ so'syaiṣa pakṣapucavānātmā yathaivāgnestathā 13.8.3.[10]
analyzed: uttaraḥ pakṣaḥ tisraḥ paścāt tat pucam saḥ usya eṣa pakṣa pucavān ātmā yathā eva agneḥ tathā

original: atha pradarātpurīṣamāhartavā āha etaddhāsyāḥ pitryamanatiriktamatho aghameva
analyzed: atha pradarāt purīṣam āhartavai āha etat ha asyāḥ pitryam an atiriktam atha u agham eva

original: tadbaddhṛ karotyasminnu haike'vāntaradeśe karṣūṃ khātvā tato'bhyāhāraṃ kurvanti
analyzed: tat baddhṛ karoti asmin u ha ekā iva antara deśe karṣūm khātvā tatobhyāhāram kurvanti

original: parikṛṣantyu haike dakṣiṇataḥ paścāduttaratastato'bhyāhāraṃ kurvanti sa yathā
analyzed: parikṛṣanti u ha eke dakṣiṇatas paścāt uttaratas tatas abhyāhāram kurvanti sa yathā

original: kāmayeta tathā kuryāt 13.8.3.[11]
analyzed: kāmayeta tathā kuryāt

original: tadvai na mahatkuryāt nenmahadagham karavāṇīti yāvānudbāhuḥ
analyzed: tat vai na mahat kuryāt na id mahat agham karavāṇi iti yāvān udbāhuḥ

original: puruṣastāvatkṣatriyasya kuryānmukhadaghnam brāhmaṇasyopasthadaghnaṃ striyā
analyzed: puruṣaḥ tāvat kṣatriyasya kuryāt mukha daghnam brāhmaṇasya upastha daghnam striyā

original: ūrudaghnam vaiśyasyāṣṭhīvaddaghnaṃ śūdrasyaivamvīryā hyeta iti 13.8.3.[12]
analyzed: ūru daghnam vaiśyasya aṣṭhīvat daghnam śūdrasya evam vīryāḥ hi ete iti

original: adhojānu tveva kuryāt tathāparasmā avakāśaṃ na karoti tasya kriyamāṇasya
analyzed: adhojānu tu eva kuryāt tathā aparasmai avakāśam na karoti tasya kriyamāṇasya

original: tejanīmuttarato dhārayanti prajā ha sā prajāmeva taduttarato dhārayanti tāṃ na
analyzed: tejanīm uttaratas dhārayanti prajā ha sā prajām eva tat uttaratas dhārayanti tām na

original: nyasyeddhṛtvā vaināmūḍhvā vā gṛheṣūcrayetprajāmeva tadgṛheṣūcrayati 13.8.3.[13]
analyzed: nyasyet hṛtvā vā enām ūḍhvā vā gṛheṣu ucrayet prajām eva tat gṛheṣu ucrayati

original: kṛtvā yavānvapati agham me yavayānityavakābhiḥ pracādayati kam me'saditi
analyzed: kṛtvā yavān vapati agham me yavayān iti avakābhiḥ pracādayati kam mā isat iti

original: darbhaiḥ pracādayatyarūkṣatāyai 13.8.4.[1]
analyzed: darbhaiḥ pracādayati a rūkṣa tāyai

original: athainacaṅkubhiḥ pariṇihanti pālāśam purastādbrahma vai palāśo
analyzed: atha enad caṅkubhiḥ pariṇihanti pālāśam purastāt brahma vai palāśaḥ

original: brahmapurogavamevainaṃ svargaṃ lokaṃ gamayati śamīmayamuttarataḥ śam
analyzed: brahma purogavam eva enam svargam lokam gamayati śamī mayam uttaratas śam

original: me'saditi vāraṇam paścādagham me vārayātā iti vṛtraśaṅkuṃ
analyzed: mesat iti vāraṇam paścāt agham me vārayātai iti vṛtraśaṅkum

original: dakṣiṇato'ghasyaivānatyayāya 13.8.4.[2]
analyzed: dakṣiṇatas oghasya eva an atyayāya

original: atha dakṣiṇataḥ parivakre khananti te kṣīreṇa codakena ca pūrayanti te
analyzed: atha dakṣiṇatas parivakre khananti te kṣīreṇa ca udakena ca pūrayanti te

original: hainamamuṣmiṃlokeṛkṣite kulye upadhāvataḥ saptottarastā udakena pūrayanti na ha
analyzed: ha enam amuṣmin loke ṛkṣite kulye upadhāvataḥ sapta uttaraḥ tāḥ udakena pūrayanti na ha

original: vai sapta sravantīraghamatyetumarhatyaghasyaivānatyayāya 13.8.4.[3]
analyzed: vai sapta sravantīḥ agham atyetum arhati aghasya eva an atyayāya

original: aśmanastrīṃstrīnprakiranti tā abhyuttarantyaśmanvatī rīyate
analyzed: aśmanaḥ trīn trīn prakiranti tāḥ abhyuttaranti aśmanvatī rīyate

original: saṃrabhadhvamuttiṣṭhata pratarata sakhāyaḥ atrā jahīmo'śivā ye
analyzed: saṃrabhadhvam uttiṣṭhata pratarata sakhāyaḥ atra jahīma uśivāḥ ye

original: asañcivānvayamuttaremābhi vājāniti yathaiva yajustathā bandhuḥ 13.8.4.[4]
analyzed: a sañcivān vayam uttarema abhi vājān iti yathā eva yajuḥ tathā bandhuḥ

original: apāmārgairapamṛjate aghameva tadapamṛjate'pāghamapa kilviṣamapa kṛtyāmapo
analyzed: apāmārgaiḥ apamṛjate agham eva tat apamṛjate īpa agham apa kilviṣam apa kṛtyām apa

original: rapaḥ apāmārga tvamasmadapa duḥṣvapnyaṃ suveti yathaiva yajustathā bandhuḥ 13.8.4.[5]
analyzed: rapaḥ apāmārga tvam asmat apa duḥṣvapnyam suva iti yathā eva yajuḥ tathā bandhuḥ

original: yatrodakam bhavati tatsnānti sumitriyā na āpa oṣadhayaḥ santvityañjalināpa upācati
analyzed: yatra udakam bhavati tat snānti su mitriyāḥ naḥ āpaḥ oṣadhayaḥ santu iti añjalinā apaḥ upācati

original: vajro vā āpo vajreṇaivaitanmitradheyaṃ kurute durmitriyāstasmai santu
analyzed: vajraḥ vai āpaḥ vajreṇa eva etat mitradheyam kurute durmitriyāḥ tasmai santu

original: yo'smāndveṣṭi yaṃ caparāsiñcettenaiva tam parābhāvayati 13.8.4.[6]
analyzed: yaḥ smān dveṣṭi yam ca parāsiñcet tena eva tam parābhāvayati

original: sa y/di sthāvarā āpo bhavanti sthāpayantyeṣām pāpmānamatha yadi vahanti
analyzed: sa ydi sthāvarāḥ āpaḥ bhavanti sthāpayanti eṣām pāpmānam atha yadi vahanti

original: vahantyevaiṣām pādmānaṃ snātvāhatāni vāsāṃsi paridhāyānaḍuhaḥ
analyzed: vahanti eva eṣām pādmānam snātvā ahatāni vāsāṃsi paridhāya anaḍuhaḥ

original: pucamanvārabhyāyantyāsneyo vā anaḍvānagnimukhā eva
analyzed: pucam anvārabhya āyanti āsneyaḥ vai anaḍvān agni mukhāḥ eva

original: tatpitṛlokājjīvalokamabhyāyantyatho agnirvai patho'tivoḍā sa enānativahati 13.8.4.[7]
analyzed: tat pitṛ lokāt jīva lokam abhyāyanti atha u agniḥ vai pathā utivoḍā saḥ enān ativahati

original: udvayaṃ tamasasparīti etāmṛcaṃ japanto yanti tattamasaḥ pitṛlokādādityaṃ
analyzed: ud vayam etām ṛcam japantaḥ yanti tat tamasaḥ pitṛ lokāt ādityam

original: jyotirabhyāyanti tebhya āgatebhya āñjanābhyañjane prayacantyeṣa ha
analyzed: jyotiḥ abhyāyanti tebhyaḥ āgatebhyaḥ āñjana abhyañjane prayacanti eṣa ha

original: mānuṣo'laṅkārastenaiva tam mṛtyumantardadhate 13.8.4.[8]
analyzed: mānuṣa ulaṅkāraḥ tena eva tam mṛtyum antardadhate

original: atha gṛheṣvagniṃ samādhāya vāraṇānparidhīnparidhāya vāraṇena sruveṇāgnaya
analyzed: atha gṛheṣu agnim samādhāya vāraṇān paridhīn paridhāya vāraṇena sruveṇa agnaye

original: āyuṣmata āhutiṃ juhotyagnirvā ā āyuṣmānāyuṣa īṣṭe tamevaibhya āyuryācatyagna
analyzed: āyuṣmate āhutim juhoti agniḥ vai ā āyuṣmān āyuṣe īṣṭe tam eva ebhyaḥ āyuḥ yācati agne

original: āyūṃṣi pavasa iti puro'nuvākyābhājanam 13.8.4.[9]
analyzed: āyūṃṣi pavase iti puronuvākyā bhājanam

original: atha juhoti āyuṣmānagne haviṣā vṛdhāno ghṛtapratīko ghṛtayoniredhi gṛtam pītvā
analyzed: atha juhoti āyuṣmān agne haviṣā vṛdhānaḥ ghṛta pratīkaḥ ghṛta yoniḥ edhi gṛtam pītvā

original: madhu cāru gavyam piteva putramabhirakṣatādimāntsvāheti
analyzed: madhu cāru gavyam pitā iva putram abhirakṣata ādimān svāhā iti

original: yathaivainānabhirakṣedyathābhigopāyedevametadāha 13.8.4.[10]
analyzed: yathā eva enān abhirakṣet yathā abhigopāyet evam etat āha

original: tasya purāṇo'naḍvāndakṣiṇā purāṇā yavāḥ purāṇyāsandī sopabarhaṇaiṣā nvādiṣṭā
analyzed: tasya purāṇaḥ unaḍvān dakṣiṇā purāṇāḥ yavāḥ purāṇī āsandī sā upabarhaṇā eṣā nu ādiṣṭā

original: dakṣiṇā kāmaṃ yathāśraddham bhūyasīrdadyāditi nvagnicitaḥ 13.8.4.[11]
analyzed: dakṣiṇā kāmam yathāśraddham bhūyasīḥ dadyāt iti nu agni citaḥ

original: athānagnicitaḥ etadeva bhūmijoṣaṇametatsamānam karma yadanyadagnikarmaṇaḥ
analyzed: atha an agni citaḥ etat eva bhūmi joṣaṇam etat samānam karma yat anyat agni karmaṇaḥ

original: kurvādāhitāgneḥ śarkarā ityu haika āhuryā evāmūragnyādheyaśarkarāstā etā iti na
analyzed: kurvāt āhitāgneḥ śarkarāḥ iti u ha eke āhuḥ yāḥ eva amūḥ agnyādheya śarkarāḥ tāḥ etāḥ iti na

original: kuryādityeka īśvaro haitā anagnicitaṃ santaptoriti sa yathā kāmayeta tathā kuryāt 13.8.4.[12]
analyzed: kuryāt iti ekaḥ īśvaraḥ ha etāḥ an agni citam santaptoḥ iti sa yathā kāmayeta tathā kuryāt

original: maryādāyā eva loṣṭamāhṛtya antareṇa nidadhātīmaṃ jīvebhyaḥ paridhiṃ dadhāmi
analyzed: maryādāyāḥ eva loṣṭam āhṛtya antareṇa nidadhāti imam jīvebhyaḥ paridhim dadhāmi

original: maiṣāṃ nu gādaparo arthametam śataṃ jīvantu śaradaḥ purūcīrantarmṛtyuṃ
analyzed: mā eṣām nu gāt aparaḥ artham etam śatam jīvantu śaradaḥ purūcīḥ antar mṛtyum

original: dadhatām parvateneti jīvebhyaścaivaitām pitṛbhyaśca maryādāṃ karotyasambhedāya
analyzed: dadhatām parvatena iti jīvebhyaḥ ca eva etām pitṛbhyaḥ ca maryādām karoti a sambhedāya

original: tasmādu haitajjīvāśca pitaraśca na sandṛśyante
analyzed: tasmāt u ha etat jīvāḥ ca pitaraḥ ca na sandṛśyante
